name: Balance your enemy!
description:
Beat up your enemies... with your enemies!

Controls: 

Z or W to grab your enemies and throw them (these are the same button, but there are both for azerty and qwerty keyboards)

X to turn around

Make sure not to throw too many bad guys on one side, or the entire place will collapse. When that happens, throw some on the other side to balance things out.

The link with the theme "balance" for this game comes from the french word "balancer", meaning "to throw". Of course, there is also a dimension of keeping balance between things, for good measure.
